effect.name: Deltarune Freeze (Texture)
effect.description: This shader recreates freeze enemy effect in the game DELTARUNE (Chapter 2) created by Toby Fox.
effect.author: Foxioo, Toby Fox

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Deltarune Freeze (Texture) Shader | 1.1 (18.10.2025) */
parameter.description: This shader recreates freeze enemy effect in the game DELTARUNE (Chapter 2) created by Toby Fox.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Color
parameter.description: This variable sets the freeze color (colors are added to the base, so the darker the color, the less visible it is).

parameter.name: Fade
parameter.description: This variable sets the visibility level of the effect depending on Y.

parameter.name: Freeze Position X
parameter.description: This variable sets the offset of the freeze layers in the X axis.

parameter.name: Freeze Position Y
parameter.description: This variable sets the offset of the freeze layers in the Y axis.
